content: this pretty crochet cowl with an effortlessly stylish shape is made from a simple rectangle that is folded in a special way and seamed the cowl design was created to perfectly complement the dreamy twisted rib headband 1 and the twisted rib hat 2 whether worn alone or as part of the full twisted rib set the dreamy twisted rib cowl is a timeless accessory- cozy textured and visually striking from every angle **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow me on instagram 2 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 3 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 4 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 5 check out my youtube channel 6 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 3 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 4 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 5 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/ 6 https //www youtube com/c/myhobbyiscrochetblog 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dreamy-twisted-rib-headband 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/twisted-rib-hat-15
